description: Rule for all insurance options: True = “insured/fulfilled”, False = “not insured/not fulfilled”. The answer “True” or “False” must correspond to reality. It does not matter whether this answer comes from the offer document or from the conditions underlying the offer. Mandatory/Optional: If an InsuranceOption is requested, the insurer must also respond to it in the offer. The insurer may also respond to an InsuranceOption that has not been requested (e.g., annual right of termination).

dailyAllowanceContinuedPaymentIncreasesB.description: Daily allowance and continued payment of salary: consideration of salary increases agreed before the incapacity for work. Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

startInsuranceCoverStartEmploymentContra.description: Start of insurance cover: Coordination with the UVG (start of employment contract). Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

endInsuranceCoverCoordinationUVG.description: End of insurance cover: Coordination with the UVG (31st day). Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.

waiverBenefitGrossNegligence.description: Waiver of benefit reductions in the event of gross negligence. Must be specified (i.e. mandatory) in offer.
